img_summary: The image depicts a snowy landscape with two characters visible in the foreground. The character on the left appears to be a humanoid creature with animal-like features, wearing a green outfit and holding a staff. The character on the right is human-like, dressed in a red and blue outfit, also holding a staff. Both characters are partially submerged in the snow, suggesting movement through the terrain. In the background, there is a large rock formation with a tree and what appears to be glowing eyes, possibly indicating a creature or object of interest. The scene is set against a backdrop of rocky cliffs.
